Container.Overview: Bacula is a network Client/Server based backup program. Baculum is web environment to easy work with the Bacula programs. There is 3 major versions of bacula: 9.4, 9,6, 11, with multiple database engines supported. If You do not havy any mysql or postgresql server, You could chose sqlite3 versions, but this version is not recomended. Please read support thread before You start: https://forums.unraid.net/topic/bacula-server
Container.Description: Bacula is a network Client/Server based backup program. Baculum is web environment to easy work with the Bacula programs. There is 3 major versions of bacula: 9.4, 9,6, 11, with multiple database engines supported. If You do not havy any mysql or postgresql server, You could chose sqlite3 versions, but this version is not recomended. Please read support thread before You start: https://forums.unraid.net/topic/bacula-server

Config.Name: TimeZone
Config.Description: Set Your Timezone

Config.Name: IPAddress for Storage Server
Config.Description: If You set bridge network, You should type in Unraid Host IP Address. This IP is sent to clients, which could connect to storage server using this IP

Config.Name: WEB Username
Config.Description: WebUI Username

Config.Name: WEB User Password
Config.Description: WebUI Password

Config.Name: Bacula Director Port
Config.Description: This port could be used to remote management

Config.Name: Bacula Storage Port
Config.Description: Clients connects to sending backups

Config.Name: Bacula WEB Port
Config.Description: Bacula WEB Port

Config.Name: Bacula API Port
Config.Description: Bacula API Port

Config.Name: Bacula config path
Config.Description: Bacula Configuration path

Config.Name: Bacula storage path
Config.Description: Path where backups will be stored on Host disk

Config.Description: Path where bacula's logs will be stored on Host disk
